suite.name: Test Suite

kw.name: Initial Setup
kw.doc: Initial setup where the testbed file scan is done to check for any errors and to check if the setup satisfies the minimum requirements for the Usecase.

kw.name: TestBed Scan
kw.doc: Scans the testbed file for any syntax errors and also checks if the links and the ports description are defined correctly.

kw.name: Run Keyword
kw.doc: Executes the given keyword with the given arguments.

kw.name: Testbed Check 1
kw.msg: Link DUT1_DUT4_1 is correctly defined.
Link DUT3_DUT4_1 is correctly defined.
Link DUT1_DUT2_1 is correctly defined.
Link DUT2_DUT3_1 is correctly defined.
${result} = True

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

arguments.arg: Devices defined in links do not match with the devices specified.

kw.name: Run Keyword
kw.doc: Executes the given keyword with the given arguments.

kw.name: Testbed Check 2
kw.msg: Interfaces [u'DUT1', u'DUT4'] defined for link DUT1_DUT4_1 is correct
Interfaces [u'DUT3', u'DUT4'] defined for link DUT3_DUT4_1 is correct
Interfaces [u'DUT1', u'DUT2'] defined for link DUT1_DUT2_1 is correct
Interfaces [u'DUT3', u'DUT2'] defined for link DUT2_DUT3_1 is correct
${result} = True

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

arguments.arg: Interface description mentioned for a link is incorrect

kw.name: Run Keyword
kw.doc: Executes the given keyword with the given arguments.

kw.name: Testbed Check 3
kw.msg: Valid Management IP Address On DUT1 :- 172.17.0.5
Valid Management IP Address On DUT2 :- 172.17.0.4
Valid Management IP Address On DUT3 :- 172.17.0.3
Valid Management IP Address On DUT4 :- 172.17.0.2
${result} = True

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

arguments.arg: Management IP mentioned for the devices is invalid

kw.name: Run Keyword
kw.doc: Executes the given keyword with the given arguments.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

arguments.arg: Duplicate ports are mentioned for same interface in two links

kw.name: Run Keyword
kw.doc: Executes the given keyword with the given arguments.

kw.name: Testbed Check 5
kw.msg: No duplicate for port fpPort1 found on device DUT1.
No duplicate for port fpPort2 found on device DUT1.
No duplicate for port fpPort8 found on device DUT3.
No duplicate for port fpPort4 found on device DUT3.
No duplicate for port fpPort3 found on device DUT2.
No duplicate for port fpPort7 found on device DUT2.
No duplicate for port fpPort6 found on device DUT4.
No duplicate for port fpPort5 found on device DUT4.
${result} = True

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

arguments.arg: Duplicate ports are mentioned for interfaces of same device in ports list

kw.name: GLOBAL_PRECHECK
kw.doc: Performs various checks to determine if the setup is as per the testbed file.

kw.name: Check Device Status
kw.doc: Checks if the devices mentioned in the testbed files are reachable.

kw.name: Run Keyword
kw.doc: Executes the given keyword with the given arguments.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Fatal Error
kw.doc: Stops the whole test execution.
kw.msg: Device does not exist
Traceback (most recent call last): None

test.name: ARP
test.doc: Display all the ARP entries and check if the entry is updated once any link goes DOWN.
test.status: Test execution stopped due to a fatal error.

kw.name: CleanUp
Unconfigure BGP Neighbors
kw.doc: Unconfigure BGP Neighbors

kw.name: Run Keyword
kw.doc: Executes the given keyword with the given arguments.
